name: Fartinator
description:
Have you ever wanted to hear VERY GOOD quality fart sound in stereo? This is for you!

Currently the game has:

  • 3 fart sound
  • HD GRAPHICS
  • dog AND cat(PLANNED FOR 1.2) 

Things that are planned:

  • more fart sounds 
  • changeable background 
  • settings menu
  • bug fixes
  • android builds
  • macOS builds
  • loading screen
  • simulations

Platforms:

  • Windows: Works
  • Linux: Works
  • MacOs:Coming soon! 
  • Android:Won't work:/
THE FART IS REAL AND THE HYPE IS REAL Well I don't know about hype but the fart is real.

I don't know how well I will make these or support these. 

This is just a joke but I might make more for this game. 

Why? 

Well I always wanted to make a full game. 

Check out Cave Shift. My new game that is in development. It will be lot better than this. FAQ:

Why is there no android support? 

I currently have a issue where it won't build the android verison. 

Why does this exist? 

I don't know.
